reasoning: Drug toxicity/adverse drug reactions (ADRs): aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major categories: hepatotoxicity (~1000), nephrotoxicity (~500), cardiotoxicity (~800), hematologic (~1000), dermatologic (~1500), GI (~100), etc. Total ~5000 per 100k population per year. Heterogeneous category heavily dependent on drug exposure, population, and detection/reporting rates. Low confidence due to aggregation and variable definitions.
